titleStmt.title: To the most Honourable House of Commons, commonly called, the Lower House of Parliament. The humble petition of the masters or gouernors of the mysterie and comminaltie of barbers and chirurgions of London

notesStmt.note: Against the patent obtained by the physicians to supervise the barber surgeons as well as the physicians--STC.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
